text: Mark William Pocan (; born August 14, 1964) is an American politician and businessman. He is the U.S. Representative for Wisconsin's 2nd congressional district since 2013. He is a member of the Democratic Party, Pocan is Co-Chair of both the Congressional Progressive Caucus and the Congressional LGBT Equality Caucus. From 1999 to 2013 he was a member of the Wisconsin State Assembly. He is openly gay. In January 2020, Pocan endorsed Senator Bernie Sanders for President. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Mark Pocan official U.S. House website *Mark Pocan for Congress * *Campaign 2008 campaign contributions at Wisconsin Democracy Campaign *Meet Mark Pocan, the Original ALEC Spy, Molly Redden, The New Republic, July 25, 2012 Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Wisconsin Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Gay men Category:People from Kenosha, Wisconsin Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark Pocan
